name: Hansel and Gretel: Gingerbread Witch Stories 2.0
name_original: Hansel and Gretel: Gingerbread Witch Stories 2.0
description:
Description (Made for Rapid Game Prototyping Class)

We've all heard the story of Hansel and Gretel. Two children get lost in the woods and come across a witch who lures them with candy to eat them, but she ends up falling into her own cooking pot and dying. 

But what about all the children before Hansel and Gretel?

Play as the Gingerbread  Witch as you lure children on their way home from school with candy traps. 

Please fill out the survey once you've completed the game!

SURVEY Credits 2.0

Joshua Leite - Programmer

Leyla S. Ozluk - Sound Designer, Game Designer
